title: Bug 35156: Ctrl+F1 works only on some fields in the help search
OB: When using Ctrl+F1 in the help search, it only works on certain fields, limiting its functionality.
EB: Ctrl+F1 should consistently work across all fields in the help search, ensuring uniform accessibility.
SR: Ensure that the Ctrl+F1 keyboard shortcut functions correctly on all applicable fields within the help search, providing a seamless user experience.
